remarks: An operation on positive reals has no largest member.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Mar-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
genp.1 $e |- F = ( w e. P. , v e. P. |-> { x | E. y e. w E. z e. v x = ( y G z ) } ) $.
genp.2 $e |- ( ( y e. Q. /\ z e. Q. ) -> ( y G z ) e. Q. ) $.
genpnmax.2 $e |- ( v e. Q. -> ( z <Q w <-> ( v G z ) <Q ( v G w ) ) ) $.
genpnmax.3 $e |- ( z G w ) = ( w G z ) $.
genpnmax $p |- ( ( A e. P. /\ B e. P. ) -> ( f e. ( A F B ) -> E. x e. ( A F B ) f <Q x ) ) $.
$d A f x y z $.
$d B f x y z $.
$d F f x y $.
$d G f v w x y z $.
